scripts.release:draft: CHANGELOG=$(sed -n "/^## v$npm_package_version/,/^## /p" CHANGELOG.md | sed '1d;$d') && gh release create v$npm_package_version --draft --title v$npm_package_version --notes "$CHANGELOG"
scripts.git:push: CHANGELOG=$(sed -n "/^## v$npm_package_version/,/^## /p" CHANGELOG.md | sed '1d;$d') && git add . && git commit -m "$CHANGELOG" && git push -u origin main
scripts.cicd: yarn git:push && yarn release:draft && yarn release:publish
